% Equations for scale-kernel-v1
\section{Equations: scale-kernel-v1}

\subsection{scale}
\label{eq:scale}

\begin{equation}
  y_i = \alpha Â· x_i + \beta
\end{equation}

\textbf{Domain:} $x \in \mathbb{R}^n, \alpha \in \mathbb{R}, \beta \in \mathbb{R}$

\textbf{Codomain:} $y \in \mathbb{R}^n$

\textbf{Invariants:}
\begin{itemize}
  \item $y finite when x finite$
\end{itemize}
